channel.title: Custom ranks
channel.description:
Hi moparscape community i'm look for some help/guides
I want to add some new ranks in my server, but i have no clue how i'm looking for a guide or a reply to this topic to help me out! what i want is
Super-Donator rank: rights=7, is donor=2
VIP rank: rights=8, is donor=3
Support team rank= rights=9
yes i would like to add different icons for them, super-donor = blue or green donor sign, vip, some cool rank, Support team rank is a blue circle with an "i" in the middle, can anyone help?

item.title: Custom ranks
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

tried, non showed me how to add crowns:S, and it is a insidiaX loader, with the souce TrisidiaX v2

Read full topic

item.description:
@omfgamrange wrote:

Its all client sided. Look for some guides there. Or just Google “How to add crowns” depending what your server type is
